## Source: ossf-package-analysis (85a2e473d439da53ddbf091853d2c762d54137a4f23925089435d028f2968dd2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'yellowcard-styling-config' @ 9999.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
